attributes.action: Condemn the Department of Work & Pensions in not using Royal Mail for postal services.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Despite the Prime Minister's assertion that it is vital to keep the Royal Mail postal service why is it he can preside over one of his largest departments in allowing them to use an alternative source.

NO other mail operator is prepared nor has the ability to deliver to every address in the UK as is Royal Mail.
